resources.string: Memories
It has been one whole year. Doesn\'t seem so?
I\'m sure you have a lot to remember about that day!
Did you know that this was on this day one year ago!

Give it a visit and look how did that day go!
I wonder what happened that day!
Give yourself a break see how did that day go!
Can you believe that it has been one whole year!
Does it ring any bells?
